name: Rush to Heaven
description:
You must rise to the heavens above now that your life has expired but beware, there are a lot of obstacles on the way and crashing inadvertedly into any of them will mark the end of your afterlife.

Controls:

-Move with the arrows

-Dash with left ctrl

By dashing into the enemies, you can get a super dash and go momentarily much faster. Be sure to not fly into anything else.

Wait, is heaven even real?

Art by Julien MS

Programming, Music by Weakest Imp
